text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: #GoingToTrain #SoHot #CurrenUsesBabySuncreen #I'mGonnaDoMyBest♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Now then. Onee-chan's probably waiting for me.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Now then. Onee-chan's probably waiting for me.
Ara. So this is where you were, Curren-san.
Is now a good time? Why don't we have a little "chat" with one another?
It's already past when we usually meet up for training and Curren Chan still isn't here.  She also hasn't updated her Umastagram in over an hour.
Eh? Curren-san didn't show up for training? Wait, don't tell me… did those girls from earlier…
Well you see, a little while ago some upper class students were talking to her.  Something seemed off about the whole situation though…
I was worried something might happen to her so I offered to come along, but she said everything would be fine. I felt like I shouldn't press the matter so I let her go without another word…
Trainer-san!? Curren-san is probably behind the main school building…! So please, go help her!
I rushed out, heading to where Curren Chan might be. I found her behind the main school building, surrounded by multiple upper class students…!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ah, Onee-chan! What are you doing here?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ah, Onee-chan! What are you doing here?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ah! Don't tell me, has training already started!? Ahh, I'm so sorry!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Will you ever forgive me…?
choice_data_list: That's not the reason I'm here…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ah, did you come here because of my Senpais? Don't worry, our "chat" is already over.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Isn't that right? Senpai ♪

text_block_list.name: Senior Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: Cute Curren Chan!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I'm so glad I was able to bond with my Senpais! Please continue to support me from here on out ☆

text_block_list.name: Senior Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: Cute Curren Chan!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Yup, that's the perfect response♪ And don't forget to follow me on Umastagram ☆

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Anyway, see you all later ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna go get changed. Onee-chan, I'll meet you at the racecourse!
choice_data_list: So what was that all about…?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna go get changed. Onee-chan, I'll meet you at the racecourse!
choice_data_list: So what was that all about…?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ehh…? It was nothing much, you know?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: At first they didn't seem to like me very much. So, after our little "chat" they understood just how cute I really am ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Yup. It seemed like there was a little bit of a misunderstanding between us, but I took care of it! They immediately fell in love with me while we were chatting ♪
I'm kinda interested in their secret "chat" but there's something more important that I wanted to say…
choice_data_list: I wish you didn't go alone.

text_block_list.text: While you may have been able to solve the problem this time, what if you hadn't? That is always a possibility, so I explained to her that she didn't have to do everything by herself:  that she could rely on those around her.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hehehe, you don't have to worry. I'm used to these kinds of things you know? After all, cute girls always stand out.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Plus I wouldn't want to get those other girls involved in these kinds of things.  It'll be easier to deal with them if it's just me as well.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan… When these kinds of things happen I solve them in a cute manner. I'm happy that you were so worried about me, but during times like these there's only one thing for you to say, right?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan… When these kinds of things happen I solve them in a cute manner. I'm happy that you were so worried about me, but during times like these there's only one thing for you to say, right?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Yup, there's only one thing that I want to hear from you.  You know what it is, don't you, Onee-chan…?
choice_data_list: Curren, you're the cutest girl in the universe…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Yup, there's only one thing that I want to hear from you.  You know what it is, don't you, Onee-chan…?
choice_data_list: Curren, you're the cutest girl in the universe…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I am, aren't I? ♪ Now then, we're done with this conversation, right? I'm going to go get ready!
I was pulled around by Curren Chan once again… Will there ever come a day that I truly understand her…?
